reviewtext: I need to say it up front: these are the ugliest headphones ever. With that out of the way, I can heap mounds of praise upon them.Sound is paramount, of course, and these are no exception. I sort of prefer the sound of these to some of the closed-eard headphones (which I think sound like a cave sometimes). They almost sound good as the Sennheiser 497 (not as good, of course, but still impressively close, given their price).They are exceptionally comfortable. At the risk of sounding corny, they feel like wearing air.They can folded up to very small dimensions, a nice plus.
